mapper.select: SELECT c.id AS id, u.nickname AS author, c.created_at AS createdAt, c.content AS content FROM comments c JOIN users u ON u.id = c.user_id WHERE c.group_id = #{groupId} AND c.is_deleted = 'F' ORDER BY c.created_at ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments ( content, is_deleted, group_id, user_id ) VALUES ( #{content}, 'F', #{groupId}, #{userId} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, content, is_deleted AS isDeleted, created_at AS createdAt, modified_at AS modifiedAt, group_id AS groupId, user_id AS userId FROM comments WHERE id = #{commentId} AND is_deleted = 'F'
mapper.update: UPDATE comments SET is_deleted = 'T', modified_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{commentId} AND is_deleted = 'F'
